events.message: Customer reported a car accident that occurred on 2024-04-30 involving a collision with another vehicle at an intersection.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident due to the involvement of a personal vehicle in a collision incident.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle the case and respond promptly to all inquiries related to the vehicle accident.
Acknowledgement sent to the claimant confirming receipt of the auto accident claim and the start of the claims process.
Requested documents including police report, driver's license, vehicle registration, and photos of the accident damage.
Customer submitted all requested paperwork and images showing the extent of the damage sustained during the collision.
Investigation team began evaluating the circumstances of the accident and verifying submitted documents for claim accuracy.
Completed accident investigation confirming liability and assessing repair estimates to finalize claim settlement.
Proposed settlement amount communicated to claimant based on damage evaluation and policy coverage terms.
Received positive feedback from claimant expressing satisfaction with the clear communication and settlement offer.
Claim approval completed after claimant accepted the proposed settlement amount for the auto collision damages.
Insurance payment issued promptly to claimantâ€™s account to cover the vehicle repair and related expenses.
The auto accident claim case was successfully closed following payment and confirmation of repair completion.
Final documentation and claim file archived in the system for future reference and regulatory requirements.
